name: Bunny's Trouble
description:
Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2!

You play as a bunny that needs to defeat waves of monsters in the dark of the night!
After each wave, the bunny gets rewarded with an item that will aid their survival!
But be careful, for each hit they receive, they also lose an item!
And without any items, it is game over!

It's a shoot-em-up that gets increasingly more bullet-hell-y, aka chaotic.
After 10 consecutive kills, the player is rewarded with an explosion that kills any monster nearby. Availability is indicated by the rainbow glow around the bunny.

Controls:
WASD | Arrow Keys - Movement
E | Space - Shoot
Shift - Special Attack

Originally I had planned to join this GameJam in a team, but sadly my should-have-been-partner was busy, so I decided to join it alone anyways.
And boy was it a challenge!
I wanted to do everything on my own, so everything except the fonts is made by myself.
I don't think I have ever drunken as much caffeine as I have this week...
